an9.2:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an9.2:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an9.2:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotī”ti?
an9.2:4.6: “Saddhañce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissāya akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, pahīnamevassa taṃ akusalaṃ hoti.
an9.2:4.10: paññañce, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissāya akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, pahīnamevassa taṃ akusalaṃ hoti.
an9.2:4.11: Taṃ hissa bhikkhuno akusalaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti suppahīnaṃ, yaṃsa ariyāya paññāya disvā pahīnaṃ.
an9.2:5.1: Tena ca pana, bhikkhu, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro upanissāya vihātabbā.
an9.2:5.3: Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodeti.
an9.2:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotī”ti.
